entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Fourchu Head
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:59 AM AST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Snow ending early this afternoon then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow over exposed areas near noon. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing before morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High plus 1.
